title: Psalms 119:1
text: BLESSED are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.

title: Psalms 119:2
text: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.

title: Psalms 119:3
text: They also do no iniquity: they walk in his ways.

title: Psalms 119:4
text: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently.

title: Psalms 119:5
text: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!

title: Psalms 119:6
text: Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.

title: Psalms 119:7
text: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.

title: Psalms 119:8
text: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.

title: Psalms 119:9
text: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way?  by taking heed thereto according to thy word.

title: Psalms 119:10
text: With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.

title: Psalms 119:11
text: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.

title: Psalms 119:12
text: Blessed art thou, O LORD: teach me thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:13
text: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.

title: Psalms 119:14
text: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all riches.

title: Psalms 119:15
text: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.

title: Psalms 119:16
text: I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word.

title: Psalms 119:17
text: Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live, and keep thy word.

title: Psalms 119:18
text: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.

title: Psalms 119:19
text: I am a stranger in the earth: hide not thy commandments from me.

title: Psalms 119:20
text: My soul breaketh for the longing that it hath unto thy judgments at all times.

title: Psalms 119:21
text: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, which do err from thy commandments.

title: Psalms 119:22
text: Remove from me reproach and contempt; for I have kept thy testimonies.

title: Psalms 119:23
text: Princes also did sit and speak against me: but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:24
text: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.

title: Psalms 119:25
text: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.

title: Psalms 119:26
text: I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: teach me thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:27
text: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.

title: Psalms 119:28
text: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.

title: Psalms 119:29
text: Remove from me the way of lying: and grant me thy law graciously.

title: Psalms 119:30
text: I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.

title: Psalms 119:31
text: I have stuck unto thy testimonies: O LORD, put me not to shame.

title: Psalms 119:32
text: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.

title: Psalms 119:33
text: Teach me, O LORD, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.

title: Psalms 119:34
text: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.

title: Psalms 119:35
text: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.

title: Psalms 119:36
text: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.

title: Psalms 119:37
text: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; and quicken thou me in thy way.

title: Psalms 119:38
text: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.

title: Psalms 119:39
text: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.

title: Psalms 119:40
text: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.

title: Psalms 119:41
text: Let thy mercies come also unto me, O LORD, even thy salvation, according to thy word.

title: Psalms 119:42
text: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word.

title: Psalms 119:43
text: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; for I have hoped in thy judgments.

title: Psalms 119:44
text: So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever.

title: Psalms 119:45
text: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:46
text: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.

title: Psalms 119:47
text: And I will delight myself in thy commandments, which I have loved.

title: Psalms 119:48
text: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; and I will meditate in thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:49
text: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.

title: Psalms 119:50
text: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.

title: Psalms 119:51
text: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.

title: Psalms 119:52
text: I remembered thy judgments of old, O LORD; and have comforted myself.

title: Psalms 119:53
text: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law.

title: Psalms 119:54
text: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.

title: Psalms 119:55
text: I have remembered thy name, O LORD, in the night, and have kept thy law.

title: Psalms 119:56
text: This I had, because I kept thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:57
text: Thou art my portion, O LORD: I have said that I would keep thy words.

title: Psalms 119:58
text: I intreated thy favour with my whole heart: be merciful unto me according to thy word.

title: Psalms 119:59
text: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.

title: Psalms 119:60
text: I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.

title: Psalms 119:61
text: The bands of the wicked have robbed me: but I have not forgotten thy law.

title: Psalms 119:62
text: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee because of thy righteous judgments.

title: Psalms 119:63
text: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, and of them that keep thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:64
text: The earth, O LORD, is full of thy mercy: teach me thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:65
text: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O LORD, according unto thy word.

title: Psalms 119:66
text: Teach me good judgment and knowledge: for I have believed thy commandments.

title: Psalms 119:67
text: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.

title: Psalms 119:68
text: Thou art good, and doest good; teach me thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:69
text: The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.

title: Psalms 119:70
text: Their heart is as fat as grease; but I delight in thy law.

title: Psalms 119:71
text: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:72
text: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver.

title: Psalms 119:73
text: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.

title: Psalms 119:74
text: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.

title: Psalms 119:75
text: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.

title: Psalms 119:76
text: Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort, according to thy word unto thy servant.

title: Psalms 119:77
text: Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live: for thy law is my delight.

title: Psalms 119:78
text: Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: but I will meditate in thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:79
text: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.

title: Psalms 119:80
text: Let my heart be sound in thy statutes; that I be not ashamed.

title: Psalms 119:81
text: My soul fainteth for thy salvation: but I hope in thy word.

title: Psalms 119:82
text: Mine eyes fail for thy word, saying, When wilt thou comfort me?

title: Psalms 119:83
text: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; yet do I not forget thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:84
text: How many are the days of thy servant?  when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?

title: Psalms 119:85
text: The proud have digged pits for me, which are not after thy law.

title: Psalms 119:86
text: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.

title: Psalms 119:87
text: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:88
text: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth.

title: Psalms 119:89
text: For ever, O LORD, thy word is settled in heaven.

title: Psalms 119:90
text: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.

title: Psalms 119:91
text: They continue this day according to thine ordinances: for all are thy servants.

title: Psalms 119:92
text: Unless thy law had been my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.

title: Psalms 119:93
text: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.

title: Psalms 119:94
text: I am thine, save me; for I have sought thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:95
text: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: but I will consider thy testimonies.

title: Psalms 119:96
text: I have seen an end of all perfection: but thy commandment is exceeding broad.

title: Psalms 119:97
text: O how love I thy law!  it is my meditation all the day.

title: Psalms 119:98
text: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.

title: Psalms 119:99
text: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.

title: Psalms 119:100
text: I understand more than the ancients, because I keep thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:101
text: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.

title: Psalms 119:102
text: I have not departed from thy judgments: for thou hast taught me.

title: Psalms 119:103
text: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

title: Psalms 119:104
text: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.

title: Psalms 119:105
text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

title: Psalms 119:106
text: I have sworn, and I will perform it, that I will keep thy righteous judgments.

title: Psalms 119:107
text: I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O LORD, according unto thy word.

title: Psalms 119:108
text: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD, and teach me thy judgments.

title: Psalms 119:109
text: My soul is continually in my hand: yet do I not forget thy law.

title: Psalms 119:110
text: The wicked have laid a snare for me: yet I erred not from thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:111
text: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: for they are the rejoicing of my heart.

title: Psalms 119:112
text: I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes alway, even unto the end.

title: Psalms 119:113
text: I hate vain thoughts: but thy law do I love.

title: Psalms 119:114
text: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.

title: Psalms 119:115
text: Depart from me, ye evildoers: for I will keep the commandments of my God.

title: Psalms 119:116
text: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.

title: Psalms 119:117
text: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.

title: Psalms 119:118
text: Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes: for their deceit is falsehood.

title: Psalms 119:119
text: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: therefore I love thy testimonies.

title: Psalms 119:120
text: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.

title: Psalms 119:121
text: I have done judgment and justice: leave me not to mine oppressors.

title: Psalms 119:122
text: Be surety for thy servant for good: let not the proud oppress me.

title: Psalms 119:123
text: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.

title: Psalms 119:124
text: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:125
text: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.

title: Psalms 119:126
text: It is time for thee, LORD, to work: for they have made void thy law.

title: Psalms 119:127
text: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold; yea, above fine gold.

title: Psalms 119:128
text: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; and I hate every false way.

title: Psalms 119:129
text: Thy testimonies are wonderful: therefore doth my soul keep them.

title: Psalms 119:130
text: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.

title: Psalms 119:131
text: I opened my mouth, and panted: for I longed for thy commandments.

title: Psalms 119:132
text: Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.

title: Psalms 119:133
text: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.

title: Psalms 119:134
text: Deliver me from the oppression of man: so will I keep thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:135
text: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; and teach me thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:136
text: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.

title: Psalms 119:137
text: Righteous art thou, O LORD, and upright are thy judgments.

title: Psalms 119:138
text: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.

title: Psalms 119:139
text: My zeal hath consumed me, because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.

title: Psalms 119:140
text: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.

title: Psalms 119:141
text: I am small and despised: yet do not I forget thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:142
text: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and thy law is the truth.

title: Psalms 119:143
text: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: yet thy commandments are my delights.

title: Psalms 119:144
text: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting: give me understanding, and I shall live.

title: Psalms 119:145
text: I cried with my whole heart; hear me, O LORD: I will keep thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:146
text: I cried unto thee; save me, and I shall keep thy testimonies.

title: Psalms 119:147
text: I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.

title: Psalms 119:148
text: Mine eyes prevent the night watches, that I might meditate in thy word.

title: Psalms 119:149
text: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: O LORD, quicken me according to thy judgment.

title: Psalms 119:150
text: They draw nigh that follow after mischief: they are far from thy law.

title: Psalms 119:151
text: Thou art near, O LORD; and all thy commandments are truth.

title: Psalms 119:152
text: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.

title: Psalms 119:153
text: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: for I do not forget thy law.

title: Psalms 119:154
text: Plead my cause, and deliver me: quicken me according to thy word.

title: Psalms 119:155
text: Salvation is far from the wicked: for they seek not thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:156
text: Great are thy tender mercies, O LORD: quicken me according to thy judgments.

title: Psalms 119:157
text: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.

title: Psalms 119:158
text: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.

title: Psalms 119:159
text: Consider how I love thy precepts: quicken me, O LORD, according to thy lovingkindness.

title: Psalms 119:160
text: Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.

title: Psalms 119:161
text: Princes have persecuted me without a cause: but my heart standeth in awe of thy word.

title: Psalms 119:162
text: I rejoice at thy word, as one that findeth great spoil.

title: Psalms 119:163
text: I hate and abhor lying: but thy law do I love.

title: Psalms 119:164
text: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments.

title: Psalms 119:165
text: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.

title: Psalms 119:166
text: LORD, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.

title: Psalms 119:167
text: My soul hath kept thy testimonies; and I love them exceedingly.

title: Psalms 119:168
text: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: for all my ways are before thee.

title: Psalms 119:169
text: Let my cry come near before thee, O LORD: give me understanding according to thy word.

title: Psalms 119:170
text: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.

title: Psalms 119:171
text: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.

title: Psalms 119:172
text: My tongue shall speak of thy word: for all thy commandments are righteousness.

title: Psalms 119:173
text: Let thine hand help me; for I have chosen thy precepts.

title: Psalms 119:174
text: I have longed for thy salvation, O LORD; and thy law is my delight.

title: Psalms 119:175
text: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.

title: Psalms 119:176
text: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
